data.actual_result: Test typed after the discrim does not get auto-deleted
data.expected_result: Text typed after the discrim is auto-deleted
data.short_description: Text typed after the discrim in the add friend page no longer auto-deletes
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to the add friend screen - Type a random name and a discrim - Continue typing more text after the discrim - Observe what happens to the text
